name: BIBBOX Admin
description: The BIBBOX administrator role is intended for the admin, who can install, configure and delete applications.

name: BIBBOX VM Admin
description: The BIBBOX VM administrator role is intended for the administration of the virtual machine and liferay.

name: BIBBOX PI
description: The BIBBOX PI role is intended for management of all application metadata.

name: BIBBOX Curator
description: The BIBBOX curator role is intended for management of all application metadata.

name: BIBBOX Operator
description: The BIBBOX curator role is intended for the operation of specific tools.
